author: bridge-bot
content:
<CarlBeek> Hey everyone, just a friendly reminder that RollCall #11 is happening in ~ 18.5 hours

Interesting topics include:
-PeerDAS: Moving blob proof computation to the TX sender (RollUp Sequencers)
- Discussion on limiting the number of blobs/TX in PeerDAS

Details:
- When: 14h00 UTC, Mar 12
- Agenda: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1294
- Where: Zoom link shared here ~20 mins before the call
